list: âœ¨Displays the completions that have been added
list --remote: Display all available completions in the repository({{$_psc.repo}})
update *: Update all completions that can be updated.
else{'The added completions are all the latest!'};
alias: âœ¨Manage the alias that triggers completion.
config language: It will affect all completion under this module
config language zh-CN: "After setting up, When adding completion,`nIt will download files from the Gitee repository($gitee)"
"Due to Gitee repository not being added, After setting up, It will still download files from the Github repository($github)"
+ "`n" + 'you can add a Gitee repository by running "'+ $_psc.root_cmd + ' config gitee <repo>"'
config root_cmd: Get/Set PSCompletions alias, default to psc.
config github: âœ¨Get/Set the address of github repo.
config gitee: âœ¨Get/Set the address of gitee repo
config update:
âœ¨Set whether to display remote update content when PSCompletions module is first loaded.
  1: Display updates
  0: Disable display of updates
  x.x.x: Module updates
config update 1: Display updates when PSCompletions module is first loaded.
config update 0: Disable display of updates  when PSCompletions module is first loaded.

description:
PSCompletions({{$_psc.root_cmd}}) --- Command completion manager
For more information, please visit the following project
  Github: https://github.com/abgox/PSCompletions
  Gitee: https://gitee.com/abgox/PSCompletions
init_info:
âœ¨âœ¨âœ¨PSCompletions({{$_psc.root_cmd}}) -- Init successfully!âœ¨âœ¨âœ¨
(The following content is only displayed for the first time)
You just need to type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}}" and only "Tab", and you will quickly understand all commands.
Use "{{$_psc.root_cmd}} add <completion>" to add the first completion!

About special symbols in Completion Description
- âœ¨: Press Space and Tab to get command completion When it's selected. (except for special cases)
- âœ¨âœ¨ï¼šType a string without spaces, then press Space and Tab to get command completion.
- ...: The description here will be filled in in the future.
   - If ... is the last one in the completion, it means that the display area is too small to display all completions.

For more information, please visit the project:
  Github: https://github.com/abgox/PSCompletions
  Gitee:  https://gitee.com/abgox/PSCompletions
If you find the project helpful, please consider giving it a star.
repo_add:
There are currently no remote repository added.It will lead to failure in adding completion.
You can add default repository by running the following command:
{{$_psc.root_cmd}} config github https://github.com/abgox/PSCompletions
{{$_psc.root_cmd}} config gitee https://gitee.com/abgox/PSCompletions
PSCompletions_core_info.confirm: Press Enter to continueï¼Œor press any other key to abort
cmd_error: It's recommended to type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}}" and press "Tab" to complete.
module_update: The powershell module(PSCompletions) can be updated now!Update?(The added completion will be automatically migrated)
PSCompletions_core_info.module_update_done: PSCompletions module update completed.Please restart the terminal and re-import the module
module_update_err: PSCompletions module update failed, Please enter the following command to update
PSCompletions_core_info.list_add_tip: ðŸŸ¢: You have added it.   ðŸ”´:You haven't added it yet.
add_error:
Completion({{$_}}) isn't exist.
It's recommended to type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}} add" and press "Tab" to complete.
Or type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}} search" to search available completions.
remove_err: Remove completion({{$_}}) failed. You haven't added {{$_}} yet.
It's recommended to type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}} rm" and press "Tab" to complete.
PSCompletions_core_info.search: {{if($result){'The search results are as follows:'}else{'No completion found!'}}}
PSCompletions_core_info.update_error: Completion({{$_}}) update failed, You haven't added {{$_}} yet.
PSCompletions_core_info.update_tip: If you don't want to see itï¼Œplease type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}} config update 0"
PSCompletions_core_info.update_info_no: The added completions are all the latest!
PSCompletions_core_info.alias_add_done:
The completion trigger command has been changed from {{$arg[2]}} to {{$arg[3]}}.
Please restart the terminal to take effect.
PSCompletions_core_info.config_done: {{$arg[1]}} => {{$arg[2]}} (If doesn't take effect, restart the terminal)
which_err: Locate completion({{$_}}) failed. You haven't added {{$_}} yet.
It's recommended to type "{{$_psc.root_cmd}} which" and press "Tab" to complete.
PSCompletions_core_info.less_tip: ðŸ””Press Enter to view more, or any other key to exit!({{$lines}} lines remaining)ðŸ””
PSCompletions_core_info.comp_hide:
âš ï¸Due to the limited display area size, some completions have been hiddenâš ï¸
You can filter by typing the prefix of the completion and pressing Tab

search:
e.g. {{$_psc.root_cmd}} search *    Show all
    {{$_psc.root_cmd}} search p*   Search for completion starting with p
    {{$_psc.root_cmd}} search *p*  Search for completion with p in the name
update:
e.g. {{$_psc.root_cmd}} update              => check available update
    {{$_psc.root_cmd}} update *            => update all
    {{$_psc.root_cmd}} update <completion> => update completions
alias:
e.g. {{$_psc.root_cmd}} alias list
    {{$_psc.root_cmd}} alias add git g
    {{$_psc.root_cmd}} alias rm g
example.alias_add_err: The alias ({{$arg[-1]}}) isn't available, because {{$arg[-1]}} is an existing command. Please set a different alias
config: e.g. {{$_psc.root_cmd}} config language         => Get language, it should return en-US
{{$_psc.root_cmd}} config language zh-CN   => Set language to zh-CN
